wizard.name: Royal and Loyal (Ocl22Java)
wizard.description: Creates two project containing the famous Royal & Loyal UML model of Warmer & Kleppe, some OCL constraints and test cases that can be used to test generated AspectJ code for the OCL constraints.

wizard.name: Simple Example (Ocl22Java)
wizard.description: Creates two project containing a simple UML/Java model, some OCL constraints and test cases that can be used to test generated AspectJ code for the OCL constraints.
